problem_data.title: Reverse Words in a String III
problem_data.description: Given a string s, reverse the order of characters in each word within a sentence while still preserving whitespace and initial word order.

parsed_tests: ('reverseWords', (['你好 世界'],), '好你 界世\n')
('reverseWords', (['  leading and trailing  '],), '  gnidael dna gniliart  \n')
